CIRCULAR 29 / 2000 
 
 
SUB: CARRIAGE OF   EXTRA BATTERIES 
 
 
Air passengers have been allowed to carry battery cells in the electronic items 
forming a part of their hand baggage or on their persons subject to prescribed security 
controls vide our circular No.  13/2000 dated 12.05.2000.  Clarifications have now been 
sought from this Bureau whether passenger should be allowed to carry extra or loose battery 
cells not attached with the electronic items they carry.  The matter has been examined and it 
is clarified that no extra cells or batteries will be allowed to be carried by the passengers. 
 
 
 (R.K SINGH) 
Addl Commissioner of Security (CA) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA)
